alert.note: Alert for Okeechobee; Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 3:43PM EDT until September 19 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Melbourne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Okeechobee County in east central Florida... Southeastern Osceola County in east central Florida... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 343 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Kissimmee Prairie Preserve, or 14 miles northwest of Fort Drum, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kissimmee Prairie Preserve and Yeehaw Junction. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
